name: Royal Duality
storyline:
"I haven't seen a human for quite some time. Welcome, my name is Nol, and I am the guardian of stories. I believe the story you came here to experience 'Royal Duality'... one of the most important tales in my world. A small group from the Final Fae Kingdom are on a quest to find the powerful wizard, Oliver Lunastella, who has gone missing. He had gone to gather information regarding vampire Count Helmrick, who lives in the now desolate Evergreen Castle that once belonged to the Fae... or at least, that’s the story it told, the last time I read it… The narrative can be changed you see... by you."

A group of travellers are on an urgent mission as their dear wizard friend is in the clutches of a brood of vampires in an abandoned castle. Make decisions for fae, sprites and lycans as you traverse a magical realm.
summary: Royal Duality is a free dark fantasy visual novel game with more than 15 endings. Work with a mysterious 'guardian of stories' to complete the tale - your choices dramatically impact on the outcome of the story, but will you reach the final ending... or will you find yourself trapped in an ending where all hope has been lost? With additional side stories and hidden easter eggs to find, the guardian will put you to the test in order to reveal the true story of Royal Duality.​
